Question: why are individuals from prestigious universities perceived as better candidates than those from less-known institutions?

This perception is reinforced by social and professional networks, as well as the signaling effect, where a degree from a prestigious university serves as a signal of quality and potential. Question: why do chefs from Europe garner more respect in the culinary world than chefs from Asia?
